mean_cn: adj.流行性的，传染的；  n.传染病
mean_en: a large number of cases of a particular disease happening at the same time in a particular community
sentence: The whole family has been infected with the flu in this epidemic.
sentence_trans: 这一家人在这次流感疫情中都被传染了。
word_etyma: epi在…中 + dem人民 + ic形容词后缀 → epidemic 流行的，传染的
